attributes.action: Two days off all UK schools for Eid
attributes.background: I think as a muslim parent we only get one day off school for our children for our Eid celebration and I feel like the United Kingdom is a very multicultural country and I think the law should change for at least two days off school for Eid.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition as this would be a decision for the school. 

You might like to sign this petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/244893
